Row.Text: Are you lost? Because you have strayed into my domain. I am Arminius! Now tell me why I shouldn't have my kinsmen rip out your eyes and tear off your arms?
You're in the wrong place, friend. I am Arminius, chieftain of these lands. But consider this your lucky day; I will let you live to find out if you'll prove any use to my tribe.
I am defeated. The greater warrior has won today.
I said you would have to do better than that.
I warned you not to come back to me with this pathetic deal.
I will take one finger of yours for every time you bother me with the same deal.
You're back.
Perhaps you didn't hear me when I said I would put your head on a spike if you come back.
Are you stupid as well as ugly and smelly? I don't like talking to you.
Why are you here?
Why are you here?
If you're showing your face here, you must want a beating.
My defeat may be imminent, but I will take any chance I can to take one of your limbs with me.
It's time to bury the hatchet, isn't it?
Come to beg for mercy?
Lost the will to fight?
What's the matter? Tired of battle?
What do you want? Come to lie to my face again?
Just because we are working together, doesn't mean you can come here whenever you want.
It won't be long before we have {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}'s head on a stake
You are lucky that it is not with me that you war. If it were with me, I would be wearing you instead of this bear.
Hmph.
Have you finally come to do battle? Because I've been waiting to bloody my hands with your guts.
Do you want a fight with me? Then get your warriors off of my borders.
It's angering me to see you here after watching you settle all over the place. You best get out of here, quickly.
I don't want to have to snap your neck, but I also don't want to put up with your endless expansion.
You know putting a pretty stamp on a piece of paper doesn't make that land yours, yes? I will take it eventually.
I don't want to gut you over something as silly as a recent purchase of land, but that land belonged to one of my tribes.
You've powerful warriors, or so I am told. A fight between you and I would prove it, if you've the gall.
Be careful with that great wealth. Great wealth makes the envy great, too.
The puny one makes an appearance. We were just talking about you. Only bad things, I assure you.
Your warriors are barely men. I wouldn't be caught dead trying to fight them.
You have a proud reputation as a warrior, but your conquests are sloppy and careless. Take a lesson from someone like I who knows war.
I would sooner cut off your hands than shake them.
I want you to denounce {1_CivName}. That way, when my kinsmen attack them, others will think it was you.
So you want to dishonour me, do you? I'll show you what happens next.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

If I had known before how much of a problem you would be for me, I would've ripped out your tongue before it had even offered that friendship.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
If you think I'll just let this stand, you'll next wake up dead. Or you won't.
So you're friends with {1_CivName} now? Don't think this means anything between us.
If you get too cosy with {1_CivName}, I'll be glad to bury you in the same grave.
{1_CivName} is more honourable than you, and your denunciation of them proves it.
Good. {1_CivName} was about to get a beating from me anyway.
So you think {1_CivName} is honourable, do you? Fine. I'll befriend them too.
I see you hate {1_CivName} too. I'll be sure to save one of their children for you to take home when I pillage their capital.
So I'll make sure to dig the grave big enough for you and {1_CivName} then.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
I see your warriors amassing near my border. There will be lakes of blood where they stand if you don't move them.
If you want to keep those warriors on my borders, I suggest you move them.
It seems your word is worth nothing, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. How despicable. The world will know of your crimes.
Your flagrant aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences should you continue assault.
You keep expanding like you are and I'll see to it that I have my warriors sent your way.
You keep expanding into my lands as if you hoped I would not notice.
You said you would stop expanding into my lands, but you clearly lied. So you won't mind if I cut out that lying tongue of yours?
You keep buying up my lands as if you thought I wouldn't send my warriors to reclaim them.
You recently purchased some land too close to mine. This is a stern warning against that.
So it seems you lied when you told us that your empire would stop purchasing land near us. I guess you have no use for that tongue after all.
It is rare to find those warriors worthy of calling a friend, but I believe I've got a friend in you.
The world should know that they are free to crush you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Now the world will look the other way when my warriors bludgeon you to death.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
{1_PlayerName:textkey} threatens the existence of our two nations. If we hope to crush them swiftly, we should work together.
It is time to go to war with {1_PlayerName:textkey}. If you don't honour this call, I will consider you my enemy, too.
I can never forgive your dishonour.
Does this mean you are now my enemy? Good. I've been waiting to see what your lungs would look like on my mantle.
I wanted to tell you that I think of you as one of my kin.
It is clear to all that you are a great and powerful warlord. I ask that you might also be compassionate towards those like myself who are weak.
Oh great one, my hope is that you will long serve as a paragon of strength and virtue for lesser leaders such as myself.
Your bold warmongering impresses me. Perhaps one day we can team up.

It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within my sphere of influence, and I'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
I couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when I realized it I couldn't help but share.
I'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
Your warriors are pathetic. They are mere boys, fighting for a mere child. They know nothing of honour or courage.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It amuses me that you must resort to bullying in order to compensate for your own weaknesses.
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
We've been over this before. The answer is still no.
Fine. The land is not worth my time anyway.
If you want to just found cities for me, then go ahead.
No. It would bring me too much shame.
This sounds like fun.
This sounds like fun. Give my warriors time to prepare for the onslaught.
Fine. If it'll keep you out of my lands.
Hah. You're in no position to make such a demand.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're not fooling anyone. I have nothing to fear from you.
Haha! You are not strong enough to make such demands of me.
You dare insult me in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it from my dead body.
If you want that you'll have to come and get it.
I would sooner fight you than submit to this demand.
Are you looking for a fight?
What's your offer?
Get on with proposing your offer.
I think I've bloodied your armies enough. What do you think of this peace?
I'm willing to show you mercy. Are you wise enough to accept it?
You have something I want. If you don't hand it over quietly I'll have no choice but to take it by force.
My kinsmen are suffering whilst yours are gorging on roasts and sweets. I cannot control their envy unless you give me what I need.
If you want to make a formal arrangement to open our borders, then here is your chance.
I would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

I would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
I feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
This was a good deal. Would you repeat it?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
Give us this luxury, or they'll be some broken bones to pay instead.
Then I will crush you.
I am not surprised by your dishonour. I will gladly show no mercy.
Your army may be stronger, but I shall revel in your death all the more.
So be it. My armies will fight to the death against your wicked forces.
You will forever be known as a villain who preys on the weak.
I will gladly watch as your armies are decimated by my superior forces.
Your armies are welcome to come and enjoy the destruction that will befall them.
Attacking me was a mistake. I will soon show you why.
If you wish to fight, I certainly will not back down.
Trading blows with you will be my pleasure. Make sure that you put up a fight.
This should be fun. I revel in every opportunity to defeat someone like you.
Just because I am weak, does not mean I will not smash in your face if given the opportunity.
Haha. Well, I won't question your decision, but it appears to me that you've made a big mistake.
I had thought of you as a kinsman of mine, but sadly I was mistaken.
I had thought of you as a kinsman of mine, but sadly I was mistaken.
You are a threat to my people, so our differences must be settled in battle.
All your riches are belong to me.
It is time to fight.
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, I will show no mercy for your actions.
Your lands will make a fine addition to my own.
This world is destined to be mine. It is time for me to show you what that means.
I'll be honest with you - I intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
Now is the time for my master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
The advantage is mine. I will now destroy you.
I have waited long enough. I have seen an opening in your defense and I will use it to my advantage.
I have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now my time. I will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
Fate is not on your side. Crossing my path with such weakness is a mistake you will not long regret.
The current situation cannot be ignored. It is now or never.
I cannot ignore this chance to eliminate a potential competitor.
Your weakness presents to me a great opportunity. You have my apologies.
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. I will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. I will, however, find a way to defeat you.
Your might is unmatched, but I will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with me, but I find a way to destroy you.
Your incredible strength will not deter me from finding a way to defeat you. May the fates smile on me.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
Your weakness is my opportunity. Placing any trust in me was a mistake.
Backstab is such an ugly word. Shall we instead say I am just "reinterpreting" our supposed friendship?
I have to admit, I never really liked you much. Pretending to do so was getting old anyways. But enough with the small talk, it's time for you to die.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I see no alternative to revealing my deceptive practices. I can now only pray that my armies succeed.
So be it. My warriors will extract it from your lands then.
Then war it is.
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
There is still honour to be won by battling you.
Not until I can snap your bones and piss in your skull.
Excellent.
Wonderful.
I am pleased to hear this.
That is good to hear.
You have my thanks.
You are truly a great leader.
History will long remember your great deeds.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is disappointing.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for children's slaughter.
You will regret this.
For freeing those captives, you have my thanks. Although this should be an impossible scenario.
You think you can claim my lands without consequence? Think again.
I was hoping you would say this. My warriors were looking for a fight.
A shame. My warriors were looking for a fight.
Ha-ha. Be that way then.
Do not lie to me.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
You realise who you're dealing with, don't you? If you did, you wouldn't have replied so foolishly.
I have no more business with the likes of you then.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is intolerable. I demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under my protection.
I heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under my protection? Do not provoke me further.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
Your little friend {@1_MinorCivName} is so easy to push around. They gave in to our tribute demands, and I don't believe you are in a position to do anything about it.
It's come to my attention that I may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, I hope.

I've been informed that my armies have taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. I assure you, this was quite unintentional, and I hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.

Warm salutations to you wise leader! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Freedom. The free world will be stronger with one more nation to help us all fight against oppression!
Greetings comrade! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Perhaps we can find some opportunities to aid each other during our empires' next 5-Year Plans!
Welcome great emperor! I'm pleased to see you have also chosen to follow the path of Autocracy. May we work together to ensure that only the very strongest nations survive to achieve true greatness!
How did one of your filthy agents somehow steal one of our basic technological secrets? These may be the last words we speak in peace.
I am willing to overlook your recent theft of one of my technological secrets with a solemn promise that it won't happen again.
I'm glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from us. From my experience, it is far less dangerous to read a book and try to learn something yourself.
I regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings rest with the deceased operative.
Hello there. Are you here about that little spying incident?
One of my cities was recently stolen from, and I want your assurance that it wasn't you. If it were, I'll beat you up.
I suspect you to have been spying on my civilization. If I find the spy in question, I will feed his entrails to my dogs.
I see you are trying to convert my people to your faith? Let's see how convinced they are in your God when I have your missionaries beaten to death. Want to stop now?
Is that so?
Good. I knew you wouldn't dare anything else.
Then your missionaries shall keep their heads.
Then you will find your missionaries without heads when they return.
Fine. Continue to pray to your false Gods then.
I will not let your people live in ignorance of the falsehood of their Gods.
We will settle more nothing more than your complete surrender.
We can make a deal now to forestall your utter annihilation.
We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It seems that our goals are aligned.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits our interests quite nicely. You have our sincere gratitude.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant attack on our interests. I hope this does not escalate to future conflict.
I found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} very troubling. Surely there is a better way to resolve our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. Together we can accomplish many great things.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I do not take such transgressions lightly.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. Do not expect our delegation to support your interests in the future.
We thank you for entrusting the World Congress to our capable leadership. I expect great things to come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
Very well. I'll be monitoring the situation.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
Any deal we suggest would result in an unfair exchange for you.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. This needs to stop.
Sorry, our plans are too important to be stopped over a trinket.
As you wish, we will stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Do I have to escalate this?
Thank you for heeding our request. An artifact discovered on our land belongs to our people, not yours.
I'll dig wherever I want.
We meant no offense when attempting to steal your cultural heritage.
The people of my nation have been corrupted by your bourgeois messages of liberty and equality. They seem to believe they have the right to demonstrate in the streets!
Your ideological plotting has us scared of a revolution for Order in our land. Will these workers' strikes never end?
Your message of strength through supreme power has resonated with our people. Must we imitate your feared totalitarian state?
Your citizens clamor for human liberties. Tear down this wall of oppression and join the cause of Freedom and progress!
The oppressed workers of your land are unhappy. Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
Your restless people are in need of strong leadership. Join us in writing history instead of sitting there with your hands folded.
With celebration, we greet you in joining us in our quest for Freedom. Ask not what we can do individually, ask instead what we can do together.
Give us the child for eight years and it will be a socialist forever. Your working class have heard this truth; now we welcome them to our revolutionary struggle for Order.

You will not regret your move to Autocracy. All within the state; nothing outside the state; nothing against the state. Only the strong leaders of strong states can bring the world into a glorious new era together.
Your tourists cannot get enough of my civilization. It is really quite embarrassing for you.
